dashboard.label: チェーンサーチ(Dashboard Studio)
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":true,"rowNumbers":true,"totalsRow":false},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"showProgressBar":false,"title":"Inernal Server Error - Top 5 (action/uri_path)"},"viz_chart_1":{"type":"splunk.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"Inernal Server Error - 時系列(uri_path別)","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true,"yAxisScale":"log"},"context":{}},"viz_chart_2":{"type":"splunk.bar","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_3"},"showProgressBar":false,"title":"Inernal Server Error - 集計(商品/uri_path別)","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true},"context":{}},"viz_EJtq6J77":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"index=tutorial action=purchase status=5* 
| bin _time span=1d 
| table _time action categoryId status uri_path 
| top limit=5 action status uri_path (チェーンサーチ) ","fontColor":"#ffffff","backgroundColor":"#294e70"}},"viz_uNRuPiSK":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"index=tutorial action=purchase status=5* 
| bin _time span=1d 
| table _time action categoryId status uri_path 
| timechart count by uri_path (チェーンサーチ)","fontColor":"#ffffff","backgroundColor":"#294e70"}},"viz_V6FeF718":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"index=tutorial action=purchase status=5* 
| bin _time span=1d 
| table _time action categoryId status uri_path 
| chart count by uri_path categoryId (チェーンサーチ) ","fontColor":"#ffffff","backgroundColor":"#294e70"}},"viz_GBIv7fhs":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"- ポストプロセスサーチは Dashboard Studio の Chain Search に自動変換生成される
- Parent Search は自動命名されているので、Chain Search の名称を定義する
- ダッシュボードのパフォーマンス、システム最適化の観点からポストプロセスサーチの使用は 必須 
- チェーンサーチも、サーチ文の作り方はポストプロセスサーチと同じプラクティス が適用される","fontColor":"#00bfff"}},"viz_ATsrhwtA":{"type":"splunk.singlevalueicon","options":{"showValue":false,"icon":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://icon-check__e29f784a-31a2-4544-813f-efce24d5be32.svg"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_server_error":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial action=purchase status=5* 
 | bin _time span=1d
 | table _time action categoryId status uri_path
 ","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-1w@w","latest":"@w"}},"name":"ds_server_error"},"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"| top limit=5 action status uri_path","extend":"ds_server_error"},"name":"DS_ChainSearch1"},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"| timechart count by uri_path","extend":"ds_server_error"},"name":"DS_ChainSearch2"},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"| chart count by uri_path categoryId","extend":"ds_server_error"},"name":"DS_ChainSearch3"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":1000},"structure":[{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":420,"y":150,"w":770,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":420,"y":420,"w":770,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":420,"y":690,"w":770,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_EJtq6J77","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":150,"w":420,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_uNRuPiSK","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":420,"w":420,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_V6FeF718","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":690,"w":420,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_GBIv7fhs","type":"block","position":{"x":70,"y":0,"w":1110,"h":150}},{"item":"viz_ATsrhwtA","type":"block","position":{"x":40,"y":40,"w":40,"h":30}}],"globalInputs":[]},"description":"","title":"チェーンサーチ(Dashboard Studio)"}
